name: freelancer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who is not employed by any one organization but does particular pieces of work for different organizations: She has written for a variety of publications both as a staffer and a freelancer. The firm often uses freelances.
More examplesFewer examplesWorld Press relies on its web of freelancers from approximately 40 countries.I'm an awful artist and I may need to hire a freelancer to help with the poster.The pianist has been working for almost five decades, most of those years as a freelance.What sometimes happens is management cut back on staff numbers while the number of freelances goes through the roof.
